name: Just a Cup of Coffee
description:
Game

Turmoil at the coffee shop! The Food has invaded the table, and you are the only one to prevent it from reaching its objective, the Golden Coffee Bean!

Place coffee cups to prevent foes from reaching their objective. Coffee cups will shoot at the enemies to stop them! Customize your coffee by changing it's bean type, roast, coffee size or toppings and grant it different powers such as damage bonuses, fire effect, splash damage, airstrike... Also, change the targeting of your coffees for smarter strategies!

Earn money after each level to complete your drink menu, allowing even more coffee customization. More than 15,000 different coffees can be made!

Every one of the 30 levels of the game is randomly generated, with infinite combinations: every game is unique!

Controls
  • Click on the UI to customize your coffee
  • Drag & drop your coffee to place it
  • Click on a coffee on the map to change its target
  • WASD or 🔼◀️🔽▶️ for camera movements
  • Mouse scroll for zooming / dezooming  
Tools
  • Game engine: Unity
  • 3D models: Blender
  • UI & drawings: Adobe Illustrator, Gimp, Unity
  • Music: Cubase, FL Studio
  • Sounds: Audacity

Made by Revetoon & JojoPalambas. 

Enjoy the game and give us feedback <3
